name: Space Janitor (Kickback Studios)
description:
In a far future, Earth's atmosphere has thinned and allowed dangerous space debris to plummet toward the planet's surface. Take control of the titular Space Janitor as he takes out the trash and protects the planet's future!

This game was made for the XBCGD7319 module of Vega School Cape Town's Game Design course. Its purpose is to highlight the wicked problem of space debris and the potential safety hazards and damage it could cause if not addressed without delay. 

This game was created by three Vega students: Ashveer Jugdav, Dylan de Kock and Simon Swart over a three-month period. We hope you enjoy the game!
